summary: This mod adds a ring with 26 enchantments, it is a God item craft able at a forge.
descriptionHtml:
This Mod adds a ring with 26 enchantments, all very Godlike.

The Sacred Ring of Jeebus is craft able at the forge.

Version E26 V2
Enchantments:
1. Disease Resist 100%
2. Additional Armor Rating +300
3. One Hand Damage increased by 500%
4. Marksmanship damage is increase by 500%
5. Carry Weight + 500
6. Health Regeneration by 500%
7. Health increased by 100%
8. Magicka Regeneration by 500%
9. Pickpocket fortified by 500
10. Stamina regeneration by 500%
11. Stamina fortified with 100
12. Resist poison 100%
13. Resist Magic 100%
14. Two Handed Damage increased by 500%
15. Unarmed Damage +1000
16. Fortify Sneak + 500 (As requested by algarvian2001)
17. Fortify Alteration +500
18. Fortify Illusion +500
19. Fortify Destruction +500
20. Fortify Conjuration +500
21. Fortify Smithing +500
22. Fortify Enchanting +500
23. Fortify Block +500
24. Fortify Speechcraft +500
25. Added water breathing
26. Added shout recharge time magnitude 1.0

Version E26 Lite V2
Enchantments:
1. Disease Resist 100%
2. Additional Armor Rating +100
3. One Hand Damage increased by 100%
4. Marksmanship damage is increase by 100%
5. Carry Weight + 100
6. Health Regeneration by 100%
7. Health increased by 100%
8. Magicka Regeneration by 100%
9. Pickpocket fortified by 100
10. Stamina regeneration by 100%
11. Stamina fortified with 100
12. Resist poison 100%
13. Resist Magic 100%
14. Two Handed Damage increased by 100%
15. Unarmed Damage +100
16. Fortify Sneak + 100 (As requested by algarvian2001)
17. Fortify Alteration +100
18. Fortify Illusion +100
19. Fortify Destruction +100
20. Fortify Conjuration +100
21. Fortify Smithing +100
22. Fortify Enchanting +100
23. Fortify Block +100
24. Fortify Speechcraft +100
25. Added water breathing
26. Added shout recharge time magnitude 1.0

WARNING WILL RUIN GAME IF YOU DO NOT COMPLETE TESIV...... VAGETA TELLS US TO AVOID THIS RING.
Version E26 V2
Enchantments:
1. Disease Resist 100%
2. Additional Armor Rating +10000
3. One Hand Damage increased by 10000%
4. Marksmanship damage is increase by 10000%
5. Carry Weight + 10000
6. Health Regeneration by 10000%
7. Health increased by 10000%
8. Magicka Regeneration by 10000%
9. Pickpocket fortified by 10000
10. Stamina regeneration by 10000%
11. Stamina fortified with 10000
12. Resist poison 100%
13. Resist Magic 100%
14. Two Handed Damage increased by 10000%
15. Unarmed Damage +10000
16. Fortify Sneak + 10000 (As requested by algarvian2001)
17. Fortify Alteration +10000
18. Fortify Illusion +10000
19. Fortify Destruction +10000
20. Fortify Conjuration +10000
21. Fortify Smithing +10000
22. Fortify Enchanting +10000
23. Fortify Block +10000
24. Fortify Speechcraft +10000
25. Added water breathing
26. Added shout recharge time magnitude 1.0

VERSION 2.0
* ADDED DISCIPLE RING
* MOVED FROM RINGS TO UNNAMED 60 (which means it will not occupy a ring slot)
* PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF THERE ARE ANY ISSUES WITH ANY OTHER MOD

Disciple's Ring
(Purpose of this ring is too protect companions, so they can use their default weapons no more fists and will be basically invulnerable)
1. Fortify Armor 10000
2. Resist Disease 100%
3. Resist Magic 100%
4. Resist Poison 100%
5. Water Breathing
6. Fortify Health 10000
7. Fortify Magic 10000
8. Fortify Stamina 10000
9. Health Regen 10000
10. Magic Regen 10000
11. Stamina Regen 10000
12. Fortify Sneak 10000
13. Fortify Blocking 10000
14. Carry Weight 10000

Don't like God rings? I'm open to suggestions on what kind of Ring is more suitable and less cheat like.

HOW TO INSTALL

-Manual Installation-
(You need WinRAR)

1. Go to the files tab
2. Click Download Manually
3. You should have a "Sacred Ring of Jeebus E26-18172-1-2.rar" in your downloads folder, or whatever default download directory you have....
4.Right click the .rar file
5.Click extract here
6. A file "SacredRingofJeebus.esp"should be in the .rar directory
7. Right click and cut"SacredRingofJeebus.esp"
8. Go to "C:Program Files (x86)SteamsteamappscommonskyrimData"
9. Paste the file
10. Start Skyrim
11. In the launcher make sure "SacredRingofJeebus.esp" is checked.
And the mod is installed!



-With Nexus Mod Manager-

1. GO to the files tab.
2. Click the green DOWNLOAD WITH NEXUS MOD MANAGER
3. Activate the mod
play!
author: DJBuckCallYo
